data.headline: Junior DevOps Engineer
data.summary: Passionate junior DevOps Engineer with a strong background in cloud infrastructure and automation. Skilled in building and maintaining reliable and scalable systems to support fast-paced startup environments.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
bullets: Led the implementation of a robust CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, reducing deployment time by 50%
Designed and deployed a Kubernetes-based infrastructure on AWS, ensuring high availability and scalability
Automated infrastructure provisioning and application deployments using Terraform and Ansible
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, improving system uptime

experience.title: DevOps Intern
bullets: Assisted in the migration of on-premises infrastructure to AWS, leveraging cloud-native services
Developed and maintained Docker containers and Kubernetes manifests for various applications
Implemented automated testing and deployment workflows using Jenkins and GitLab CI

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: Designed and developed a personal blog using Hugo, deployed on AWS S3 and CloudFront

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Friendly, confident expression. Wearing a button-up shirt and tie.
